channel.title: [z508] Item switches
channel.description:
How do I make item switches on my z508-base server work as they do on RS? At the moment, when one drinks a potion or switches armor/weapons, the new potion or the displaced armor moves to the first available spot in one's inventory rather than replacing the old item's spot. I haven't been able to find a way to fix this so far. Any ideas?
Thanks,
David

item.title: [z508] Item switches
item.dc:creator: @iDavid iDavid
item.description:
